programme.desc: S01E01 During the Cold War, ex-smuggler Harry Palmer is enrolled as a reluctant but talented spy; sent to Berlin, Harry embarks on a dangerous mission and his survival depends on his own wits and the interventions of Maddox.

programme.title: The Ipcress File
programme.desc: S01E02 Palmer embraces his intuition, but gun-for-hire Randall is always one step ahead; a tip-off from a key witness draws Jean and Palmer closer to the truth, but their discovery only opens the door to a mystery.

programme.desc: S01E04 Suspecting an American hand in Dawson's abduction, Dalby challenges General Cathcart by sending Harry and Jean to the neutron bomb test; Harry follows a trail of clues into big trouble; Maddox undermines Jean's trust in her colleague.

programme.title: The Ipcress File
programme.desc: S01E05 Harry is handed over to the Chinese military where he is subjected to a bewildering regime of mental torture; Dalby's love for Dr. Lavotchkin takes its toll on his better judgement.

programme.title: The Ipcress File
programme.desc: S01E06 Harry Palmer runs from the brainwashing but cannot hide from the agents of Cathcart's conspiracy; Jean discovers the origin of Maddox's conflict; Dalby learns his organization is to be axed; Harry worries about what has been planted in his mind.

programme.desc: S06E05 Birthday Hex Following their passionate spin the bottle kiss, Ciara and Alex wonder if there's more between them than physical attraction; Paige's heart begins to drift away from Craig and toward Andrea, who's looking for something real.

programme.title: Summer House
programme.desc: S06E06 Summer Should Be Kinky Andrea is fully in his element throwing an epic 50 Shades of Summer party, and he continues to seduce Paige in the process; while Lindsay is away for the weekend, Carl returns to the Hamptons in a better place, thanks to a new lady in his life.

programme.title: Summer House
programme.desc: S06E07 One Basket, Too Many Eggs Ciara gives Alex a chance; Paige makes a confession to Craig that leaves him livid; with Kyle and Amanda's rocky relationship on display, the ladies of the house stage an intervention with Amanda; Lindsay learns some life-changing news.

programme.desc: S06E08 A Twisted Fairytale Lindsay throws an epic, twisted fairy-tale birthday bash to celebrate turning 35; when Austen arrives, Ciara isn't the only princess in the house who has eyes for this Southern Prince Charming; Paige and Craig's relationship moves in a new direction.

programme.title: Summer House
programme.desc: S06E09 Happily Ever Never Love is in the air as Lindsay's fairytale birthday continues; Carl's new fling seems to be fitting right in, and Mya hits it off with a potential suitor; Andrea does his best to put himself back on the market.

programme.title: Summer House
programme.desc: S06E10 That's Not Amore! Things between Carl and his crush start to heat up; Craig is back in town, and Paige wonders if she's finally ready to take things to the next level; Andrea brings an Italian dinner tradition to the Hamptons.

programme.desc: S06E11 Hurricane Warning After a heated exchange at dinner, the house attempts to undo the damage; Craig reveals his intentions with Paige; Lindsay admits she may have feelings for Austen; with time running out before their wedding, Kyle pressures Amanda for a prenup.

programme.title: Summer House
programme.desc: S06E13 Pre-nope The last weekend of summer starts with a bang; tensions rise among the housemates at dinner; Lindsay's Hot Hubbs pursuits land her back in the hot seat.

programme.title: World's Most Scenic River Journeys

programme.title: Hope for Wildlife

programme.title: Hope for Wildlife
programme.desc: S08E12 The First Fawn Animals are being rescued left and right, including a harbor seal, a barred owl, and even a crow; Hope knows the most majestic animals are yet to arrive as the team anticipates the first fawn of the season.

programme.title: New Kids in the Wild

programme.title: New Kids in the Wild
programme.desc: S01E05 Ravi the Baby Lion-Tailed Macaque In India, Ravi the baby lion-tailed macaque faces life in a shrinking habitat and encroaching human world; Ravi has a caring mom, a protective dad, a playful sister and numerous, cousins, aunts and uncles all watching over him.

programme.title: New Kids in the Wild
programme.desc: S02E02 Lola the Sea Lion Pup Sea lion Lola take her first chaotic steps into a macho battlefield on Argentina's coast; this baby learns key vocal and swimming skills, fights to stay by mom Maria's side, and makes a lightning-fast escape from the jaws of death.

programme.title: New Kids in the Wild
programme.desc: S02E03 Dora the Baby Murqui Southern muriqui, Dora, takes her first steps away from her mom, Mimi; exploring spider monkey troop dynamics and tail-hanging technique.

programme.title: New Kids in the Wild
programme.desc: S02E04 Knowing more about Thiago, a brave baby coati; how he sharpens his sniffing and foraging skills, crosses suburban roads near his lush Brazilian forest home and avoids inanimate and four-legged dangers.

programme.title: City Wildlife Rescue
programme.desc: The Possums & The Ducklings Watch the staff go gaga over baby possums and perform a rooftop duckling rescue.

programme.title: City Wildlife Rescue

programme.title: City Wildlife Rescue
programme.desc: The Mink & The Coyote See the team tutor a baby mink and provide a coyote some alone time to heal.

programme.title: City Wildlife Rescue
programme.desc: The Raccoon and The Bats The team at the Toronto Wildlife Center tend to ill and injured animals, with the hope of returning them to their natural habitat.

programme.title: Uptown Otters

programme.title: Wild Pacific Rescue
programme.desc: S01E01 Baby Sea Otter Finds a Family The team saves a massive sea lion caught in a plastic noose; a visit to the Rescue Centre where a harbor seal pup may lose its eyesight; a baby sea otter needs a risky but life-saving surgery.

programme.title: Cub Camp
programme.desc: S01E01 The Littlest Cub Get to know Winston, a tiny abandoned cub who imprints on Judy as she nurses him 24-7.

programme.title: Cub Camp

programme.title: Cub Camp
programme.desc: S01E04 Victor Goes Wild Navigate rain, new climbing structures, and a first meeting of the summer cubs.

programme.title: Cub Camp

programme.title: Cub Camp
programme.desc: S01E06 Goodbye Campers Prepare for the summer cubs' release with Roger; meet Ace and Little Blueberry, two newbies with serious health issues who will have to stay over the winter with the Z cubs; six happy, healthy bears embark on their new lives in the wild.

programme.title: Orangutan Jungle School

programme.desc: S01E03 Blood Mountain A woman is found murdered on the Appalachian Trail and her husband is missing, leaving authorities to wonder if he's the killer or another victim, then more bodies begin to appear.

programme.title: Murder by Numbers
programme.desc: S02E01 Monster Among Us A monster hunts the streets of Baton Rouge, La., raping and murdering three women; when one brave woman survives a vicious attack, evidence leads police to the hunter.

programme.title: Atlanta Child Murders: Motion to Reopen
programme.desc: S01E01 Part 1 The city of Atlanta lives in fear from 1979 to 1981 as black children are murdered and the community is neglected; featuring exclusive updates.

programme.title: Atlanta Child Murders: Motion to Reopen
programme.desc: S01E02 Part 2 Police finally have a suspect for the tragic crimes, but attempt to get enough evidence to arrest him; featuring exclusive updates.

programme.title: Atlanta Child Murders: Motion to Reopen
programme.desc: S01E03 Part 3 Wayne Williams goes on trial for murder, but public opinion is split regarding his guilt; featuring exclusive updates.

programme.title: Before They Kill Again
programme.desc: S01E02 He Watched Them Burn As Washington, DC burns, police realise they are hunting the most prolific arsonist in US history, and he has been getting away with it for decades.

programme.title: Before They Kill Again
programme.desc: S01E04 The Twelve Signs He Will Die A copycat Zodiac killer terrorises New York City while keeping cops guessing his identity; it falls to veteran NYPD detectives to outwit him.

programme.title: Before They Kill Again
programme.desc: S01E06 The Outdoorsman Killer Detectives track a predator who uses the great outdoors as both a hunting ground and a hiding place; the killer's knowledge of the wilderness gives him advantage, forcing investigators to dig deep into his psyche and rely on their training.

programme.title: See No Evil
programme.desc: S12E06 Austin Serial Bomber In 2018, an explosion kills Anthony House on his doorstep; as police investigate, another bomb goes off, killing teen Draylen Mason; it becomes clear that Austin, Texas, is under attack from a serial bomber; police must use CCTV to track him down.

programme.title: See No Evil
programme.desc: S12E07 The Big Guy On Valentine's Day, police discover Demetrius Graves fatally stabbed on the street; two days later, Bonnie Ross turns up dead at home; a trail of CCTV evidence uncovers that these two very different people share one fateful connection.

programme.title: See No Evil
programme.desc: S11E05 A Crash, Not an Accident In 2017, police find 51-year-old Jorge Rodriguez wandering the streets with gunshot wounds near a crashed car riddled with bullet holes; to get justice for Jorge's heartbroken daughters, they follow a trail of CCTV left by the mysterious suspect.

programme.title: See No Evil
programme.desc: S11E07 Toying With Us In 2013, someone murders 35-year-old assistant manager Larry Wells in his office at Toys R Us; a disguised knife-wielding man appears on camera stalking the store; police must now follow the trail of surveillance footage to track down the killer.

programme.title: See No Evil
programme.desc: S11E08 The Hand-Off In 2018, a killer shoots 33-year-old restaurant worker Joshua Webb outside an apartment block in Beckley, W.V.; to solve the murder and identify the culprit, police must unravel a web of lies by following a trail of security footage.

programme.title: See No Evil
programme.desc: S12E02 Nowhere Girl In 2020, 21-year-old Dioneth Lopez goes missing while on a trip to visit friends; her body turns up in the woodlands of Washington State; she is treated as a Jane Doe until detectives find surveillance footage that pieces together her final hour.

programme.title: Bad for Each Other ᴺᵉʷ
programme.desc: Movie (1954) Dr. Tom Owen (Charlton Heston) is an Army doctor on leave to visit his mother, who still lives in the poor Pennsylvania mining town where he grew up. After falling in love with wealthy socialite Helen Curtis (Lizabeth Scott), Tom turns down a position as the local doctor and takes a lucrative job at an elite Pittsburgh clinic. Though he's happy with his newfound success and his recent engagement to Helen, a cave-in at the town mine forces Tom to decide where his heart really lies.

programme.title: Killer Confessions: Case Files of a Texas Ranger
programme.desc: S01E01 Pathologically Evil After four women vanish, fear grips Texan communities, and desperate families seek answers; with a potential serial killer back in the spotlight, Texas Ranger Jim Holland launches a high-stakes interrogation that tests wills and aims for the truth.

programme.title: Atlanta Justice
programme.desc: S01E02 Ring of Truth After getting married in Las Vegas, Demetra and Orlando Smith settle down in Atlanta; then, Demetra is found murdered in their home, with her bloody wedding ring pried off her finger and tossed into a sink.

programme.title: Atlanta Justice
programme.desc: S01E03 Speaking for the Dead Stephanie Seabrum is shot dead at a convenience store; shortly thereafter, Detective JD Stephens begins looking into the shooting deaths of teens Blanca Badillo and Policarpio Luviano, and the homicide team ponders whether the two cases are linked.

programme.title: American Monster
programme.desc: S10E05 Enjoy the Moment While It Lasts Mystery shrouds the Iraqi community in Michigan when a devoted father of two is found hacked to death in his home; as the search for his killer intensifies, investigators unravel a web of digital clues that reveal an evil conspiracy.

programme.title: American Monster
programme.desc: S09E05 Only She Knows When 20-year-old Chloe Randolph gives birth to a baby boy, her family is over the moon, but what should be a blissful time for this loving mom is about to turn into a waking nightmare.

programme.title: American Monster
programme.desc: S10E07 He Wasn't Supposed to Be Here After three divorces between them, Roberta and Ken Samard seem to have finally found a lasting marriage; 15 years on, they appear to be living their dream life in Oregon, until an early morning call to 911 exposes the ugly truth.

programme.title: American Monster
programme.desc: S09E03 It's Over. Move On. Rowena Irani, a Pakistani immigrant, aspires to be a teen psychologist until a pathological love connection shatters everything.

programme.title: American Monster
programme.desc: S10E06 I Took Her Somewhere Peaceful Tawnee Baird and Victoria Mendoza fall in love as teenagers despite their differing backgrounds, thanks to their shared love of music and dreams of fame; when passion turns to rage, only one young woman will make it out alive.

programme.title: Signs of a Psychopath
programme.desc: S09E10 Masters of Manipulation When being interviewed by police, psychopaths often use manipulation to thwart the investigation; experts explore the anatomy of the key manipulative tactics of psychopaths and how they try to utilize them for their own sinister gain.

programme.title: Signs of a Psychopath
programme.desc: S10E12 The Sexual Psychopath Experts look at a subset of psychopaths who are motivated by their heightened sexual urges and fantasies; this subset of offenders doesn't just enact physical violence but sexual violence toward their victims and is known as the sexual psychopath.

programme.title: Signs of a Psychopath
programme.desc: S09E04 It's Called Closure Terror rocks an Ohio town when a mother, her two kids and a close friend vanish; investigators track down the prime suspect and uncover a house of horrors; detectives find themselves dealing with a psychopath with a bizarre obsession.

programme.title: Signs of a Psychopath
programme.desc: S09E03 Let's Be Bonnie and Clyde A teenage couple goes on the run after an attack on the boy's sister; a search leads officers to the girl's grandparents' home, where they find the bodies of the elderly couple and uncover a fantasy killing concocted by the psychopathic lovers.

programme.title: Signs of a Psychopath
programme.desc: S10E10 Guess I'm a Bad Dad Police first arrest a man for discharging a firearm and soon discover dead bodies inside his apartment; detectives try to make sense of the bloody crime scene and a psychopath willing to murder those closest to him.

programme.title: The Curious Case of...
programme.desc: S01E01 Bam Margera "Jackass" star Bam grapples with addiction; Lima takes over his treatment; online advocate BJ attacks Lima's motives and a vicious battle ensues.

programme.title: The Curious Case of...
programme.desc: S01E06 The Doomsday Cat Cult Preacher Sheryl Ruthven, a self-proclaimed prophet, beguiles her followers into subservience and uses them to settle personal scores; as her beliefs grow increasingly bizarre, she demands her congregation adopt cats.

programme.title: The Curious Case of...
programme.desc: S01E06 The Doomsday Cat Cult - Part 2 Sheryl Ruthven, a self-proclaimed prophet, demands her followers revere cats as divine; her manipulation drives them into isolation, financial ruin, and bizarre rituals, tearing families apart and exploiting loyalty.

programme.title: The Curious Case of...
programme.desc: S01E05 Jodi Hildebrandt Therapist Jodi Hildebrandt's crusade against masturbation drives a wedge between couples in crisis; she forms a dark alliance with Mormon mommy vlogger Ruby Franke, but a horrifying 911 call exposes the depths of their bizarre beliefs.

programme.title: The Curious Case of...
programme.desc: S01E03 The Orphan Impostor Master conman Nicholas Rossi fakes his death to evade justice, adopts new identities and leaves a trail of alleged crimes across continents.

programme.title: Home Alone
programme.desc: S01E04 Inheriting Evil Southern belle CeCe Coffee falls prey to a brutal home invasion that will force her to think on her feet if she wants to stay alive.

programme.desc: S01E01 Red Wedding Hard-working immigrant Gladys Ricart finds love on a N.Y. subway, and she is introduced to a lush world she's never imagined, but her plans for a dream wedding turn into a horrifying nightmare.

programme.desc: S02E04 The Appointment Jennifer Snyder is a shy vet tech who falls for her boss, a driven young doctor; overshadowing their steamy affair is a controlling wife and a surprise pregnancy announcement that sets in motion a cold-blooded murder plot.

programme.title: Primal Instinct
programme.desc: S02E02 Slow Burn File clerk Tammy Lohr is seduced by a married police officer; things heat up when his wife receives an anonymous letter revealing the affair followed by a mysterious fire, a brutal stabbing and an elaborate plot to cover it up.

programme.title: Primal Instinct
programme.desc: S02E06 The Imposter Barbie Dailey goes looking for love online and meets Josh, who appears to be the answer to her prayers; when Barbie's friends uncover a dark secret, their fairytale romance is consumed by obsession, jealousy and a killer rage.

programme.title: Shattered
programme.desc: S03E09 The Last Song In 2004, a man pulls out a gun at a concert, opens fire at the band and takes a hostage; as fans flee, a police officer faces an active shooter while waiting for backup.

programme.desc: S02E04 The Pact In 1990, a teenage boy vanishes; nearly two decades later, there's still no trace of him, dead or alive; it's a mother's worst nightmare, but one detective refuses to stop looking until he's able to solve this mystery.

programme.title: FourWheeler

programme.title: G.A.S. Extreme Customs : Shelby's Secret Project
programme.desc: S1 E1 Beau Boeckmann and the Galpin Crew resurrect a Pantera hot-rodded by Carroll Shelby for a secret project. A famous client picks up his restored '68 Charger.

programme.title: Shorty's Dream Shop : Camaros, Impalas, Goodguys, Oh My
programme.desc: S2 E1 Shorty takes on a 1969 Camaro that needs some love, a 1965 Impala that needs an air ride, and a 1940s pull wagon that could use some paint.

programme.title: Shorty's Dream Shop : The Chupacabra Firebird
programme.desc: S2 E2 Shorty's friend Porkchop wants to turn a '69 Firebird convertible into a tribute Trans Am for his wife. Shorty and his team transform the car with a new spoiler, motor mods with AC and fuel injection, custom interior and custom racing stripes.

programme.title: Shorty's Dream Shop : Supercharged Nova and a 9/11 Tribute Truck
programme.desc: S2 E3 Arturo is a good friend of the shop and his classic Nova will be a monster, with a rebuilt supercharged 6.2 LS, plus upgrades to the chassis and brakes. The crew revives a classic 1924 LaFrance fire truck for the nearby Cedar Hill Fire Department.

programme.title: Shorty's Dream Shop : Laid-Out Dually
programme.desc: S2 E4 Monty wants to rebuild the car of his youth, an Ember Glow 1955 DeSoto. The car might be pink, but it has a hemi under the hood.

programme.title: Shorty's Dream Shop : Finishing the Ember Glow Hemi
programme.desc: S2 E5 Shorty tries to match the Ember Glow hemi's original colour, then works his magic in the paint booth. Joel tries to figure out how to install an aftermarket AC. PG works on the interior, and the crew is left with an enormous amount of trim.

programme.title: Texas Metal : C10 to a Hundred
programme.desc: S2 E5 Bill and the guys take a good 1970 C10 to a hundred with custom touches. Plus, the team modifies a 2018 Dodge Demon to get it racecar certified.

programme.title: Texas Metal : Hauler Back
programme.desc: S2 E8 Bill's skills are tested as he transforms the wrecked shell of a 1970 Suburban car hauler into a high-end diesel ride. Plus, Bill and the guys build a truck for charity.

programme.title: Texas Metal : Extra Large & Supercharged
programme.desc: S2 E9 Bill pushes his creativity as he builds his own 2018 Yukon Denali XL. This luxury SUV is their tallest build ever. Plus, a 1970 Suburban gets a makeover.

programme.title: Garage Squad
programme.desc: S4 E7 Chevy Four-by-Fix After suffering a terrible tragedy, a family is eager to get their Chevy 1976 4x4 outside and into the mud. Can the Squad get this gem back on the road?

programme.title: Garage Squad
programme.desc: S4 E8 Double Trouble Trouble has two middle names - Mustang and GTO. Can the Squad get the Mustang resurrected for the owner's wife while also struggling to get the GTO street legal?

programme.title: Garage Squad
programme.desc: S4 E9 Malibu Mayhem The squad comes to the aid of the Meyers family, to restore a 1968 Malibu in memory of their son. With such a big job, can they get it back on the road?

programme.title: Shed & Buried
programme.desc: S1 E9 Hampshire Henry and Sam explore two sets of sheds in Hampshire, where they find some Japanese bikes and another surprising discovery. Selling their finds proves to be more difficult than expected.

programme.title: Shed & Buried
programme.desc: S1 E10 In the Heart of Oxfordshire Series in which Henry Cole and Sam Lovegrove nose around people's sheds and garages in search of automotive bargains. Today, the pair visit two amazing sets of sheds in the Oxfordshire and Hampshire area. In the heart of Oxfordshire they find rare Minis, 1970s Rollers, and a pristine rally car. The Hampshire sheds are full to the rafters with Japanese bikes, but they come away with a real surprise. Selling their projects on, however, proves to be a real challenge.

programme.title: Shed & Buried
programme.desc: S1 E11 West Coast of Cornwall Series in which Henry Cole and Sam Lovegrove nose around people's sheds and garages in search of automotive bargains. Today, on the Cornish coast, Henry and Sam spend the day surrounded by vintage vehicles with genteel pedigrees including a the first ever Lotus Elan, and a pre-war Sunbeam. In Oxfordshire, Sam falls for a a Midget racer - but the restoration is a daunting task.

programme.title: Shed & Buried
programme.desc: S1 E12 Oxfordshire The boys are in Oxfordshire, and Mark's shed is more of a boneyard for giants. Everything Henry and Sam look at here is oversized and likely overpriced, but Henry likes a tractor in blue and Sam falls for a Midget racer in a hedge.

programme.desc: S5 E2 Route 66 Revisited - Part 1 Starting out from Chicago on his ludicrous American Chopper, Henry Cole is making his way through Oklahoma on iconic Route 66; braving 90-degree heat and bouts of torrential rain and meeting plenty of colourful characters along the way.

programme.title: World's Greatest Motorcycle Rides
programme.desc: S5 E3 Route 66 Revisited - Part 2 Crossing the deserts en-route to California, Henry Cole is greeted by stifling heat and zero humidity, not to mention the assortment of UFO hunters, gunslingers, eccentric millionaires and crazy rednecks.

programme.title: FourWheeler
programme.desc: S2 E1 Sami Engine Swap Ian brings back the Suzuki Samurai, this time for an old-fashioned engine swap. He plans to take out the mechanical four-cylinder diesel VW engine and upgrade it with a common rail VW diesel.

programme.title: FourWheeler
programme.desc: S2 E2 LJ Buggy Update Ian's LJ Buggy has seen plenty of rocks and off-road tracks, and he already knows how to improve the vehicle. He rebuilds a dash, adds headlights, and redoes the steering and exhaust.

programme.title: G.A.S. Extreme Customs : Details Details Details
programme.desc: S1 E2 Dave Shuten gets his chance to become hot rod royalty by competing at the Grand National Roadster Show. And, the Galpin finish a '32 Ford Roaster Pickup.

programme.title: Roadworthy Rescues : North Woods Rallaxie
programme.desc: S2 E1 In Michigan's Northern Peninsula, Derek finds a 1964 Ford Galaxie that's sat abandoned for 32 years. He plans to turn it into a rally-tribute car.

programme.title: Roadworthy Rescues : Jeep J-Too Sketchy
programme.desc: S2 E2 Derek teams up with Dave Chappelle to revitalize a 1972 Jeep J2000 that's sat among a field of neglected Jeeps. Together, they cobble together parts from various Jeeps to get theirs running and attempt to make the 100-mile journey to Derek's shop.

programme.title: Roadworthy Rescues : Gutterball Cutlass
programme.desc: S2 E3 Derek teams up with his brother Sean to convert a 1966 Oldsmobile F-85 from a wannabe drag racer into a timeless cruiser. It'll take more than a paint job to make this car street-able, as the guys discover the engine is keeping a horrible secret.

programme.title: Roadworthy Rescues : Overtime Dually
programme.desc: S2 E4 Derek and Dave Chappelle find an old dually among a flock of chickens in rural Kentucky. They set out to turn it into a car-hauling shop truck.

programme.title: Roadworthy Rescues : Hatchet Coronet
programme.desc: S2 E5 Derek enlists Steve Dulcich to help put the muscle back into a derelict Dodge Coronet. But with a completely seized drivetrain, the guys will have to replace everything on this car if they hope to make the 500-mile road trip back to Nashville.

programme.title: Wheeler Dealers : Alfa Romeo GTV
programme.desc: S18 E18 Mike finds an Alfa Romeo GTV with some fails, but he reckons Elvis can sort it. Can he get it ready for an Italian road trip to re-create the GTV Cup?

programme.title: Wheeler Dealers : Maserati 4200
programme.desc: S18 E4 Mike spots a bargain supercar, a Maserati 4200GT for under £10k. Under the hood is a Ferrari V8, but Elvis must try and fix the potentially costly gearbox and clutch issues.

programme.title: Wheeler Dealers : Fiat 600
programme.desc: S17 E15 Mike finds a Fiat 600 imported recently; Fiat 500 has originated out of Fiat 600, a car that was massive on the Continent, but little seen elsewhere.

programme.title: Wheeler Dealers : Fiat Coupe 20 Valve Turbo
programme.desc: S17 E3 Mike and Elvis take on the `baby Ferrari' but want to keep their costs low. The guys must try their best to restore this old school classic car and make it a rival to its Italian cousin once again.

programme.title: Wheeler Dealers : Some Like It Fiat
programme.desc: S16 E10 Mike and Ant welcome a zippy little 1974 Fiat X1/9 sports car to the workshop. There's hardly any rust, but big problems lurk behind the driver's seat.

programme.title: Wheeler Dealers : Fiat 124
programme.desc: S15 E22 Mike finds a 1972 Fiat 124 Spider `survivor' car. It's all original but the driving experience leaves a lot to be desired. Mike gets crafty on the interior while Ant fixes a leaky differential, replaces a carrier bearing and axle seals.

programme.title: Genghis Khan's Mongolia
programme.desc: S01E01 Rising Power Journeying to the heart of Mongolia for a look at modern nomadic life, which hasn't changed much in 800 years; exploring artifacts and a 13th-century archery technique; how the murder of Genghis Khan's father set the wheels of history in motion.

programme.title: Aerial Mexico
programme.desc: S01E04 The Industrious Highlands In Mexico's North, ancient runners defy impossible distances and living fossils reveal Earth's secrets; from Monterrey's industrial city to Guanajuato's revolutionary past, discover how mighty mountains forge unbreakable spirit.

programme.title: Ice Airport Alaska ᴺᵉʷ
programme.desc: S06E02 Life Beyond Zero A father and son team of bush aviators flies a NASA expedition into the wilderness; a rookie airline pilot attempts a landing on a remote island; a seaplane mechanic starts a helicopter repair business and customs agents.

programme.title: Extreme Airport Africa
programme.desc: S02E07 Close Encounters Of The Bird Kind A skilled canine team tracks birds disrupting Africa's busiest airport. Mechanics race to fix a cargo hauler for the largest bush airline. programme.title: Pokerstars Big Game on Tour

programme.desc: Highlighting and hard-hitting moments from the 2019 World Championship, including nail-biting final matches between Mark Stenmark and newcomer Jared Decker.

programme.title: Putt-Putt Championships
programme.desc: $100,000 in prize money is up for grabs as three of the nation's top players battle for the Putt-Putt Golf National Championship.

programme.title: Spikeball : 2022 Co-Ed Invitational: Utah
programme.desc: Coverage of the sport of roundnet played 2 vs. 2 teams.

programme.title: FlingGolf All-Star Skills Challenge
programme.desc: Six World League FlingGolf stars battle it out to see who has mastered their FlingStick.

programme.title: 2025 Golden Tee Golf World Championships
programme.desc: The world's best Golden Tee players converge at the Palms Casino Resort in Las Vegas to battle for nearly $200,000 in prizes. The stakes are high, the legends are ready -- who will take home the title in the game that helped shape esports?

programme.title: 2024 AWA Wiffle Ball All Star Game
programme.desc: The 2024 AWA Wiffle Ball All Star Game from Rock Hill, South Carolina. The format has the NL All-Stars taking on the AL-All Stars.

programme.title: Mailboat Jumping
programme.desc: Carriers compete to secure a spot on the historic Mailboat Team, jumping from boat to dock and back again while in motion. It's part timing, part chaos,and a century-old tradition that defines summer. Don't fall in-or do, but don't expect sympathy.

programme.title: Pillow Fight Championship
programme.desc: The world's only Professional Pillow Fighting league -- returns to The Ocho featuring fighters from various disciplines competing for a cash purse and ultimate bragging rights in the Hush Presents PFC tournament.

programme.title: Padel Ping Pong Championship
programme.desc: A mixture of Ping Pong and Squash, this innovative sport creates a creative blend of hand eye coordination, power and finesse. It's the Padel Ping Pong Championship, two on two competition from the sport's birthplace in Sweden.

programme.title: World Series of Armwrestling Finals Season 3
programme.desc: The World Series of Armwrestling brings the top arm wrestlers around the US to compete for over $100,000 in cash and prizes in the largest cash tournament in the world!

programme.title: 360 Hoops Championship
programme.desc: Watch the Great American Events on ESPN.

programme.title: Golf : Latin America Amateur Championship, Final Round ᴺᵉʷ
programme.desc: Action from golf tournaments around the world.

programme.title: 2025 T-Rex World Championship Races
programme.desc: It's a race of prehistoric proportion as men, women, children and seniors compete to be the 2025 T-Rex World Champion!

programme.title: FlingGolf: LFC-5 Longest FlingShot Championship
programme.desc: With FlingSticks and golf balls, top World League FlingGolf Pros battle to outdistance each other and take home the LFC Belt.

programme.title: Battle of the Buoy 2
programme.desc: Pro doubles teams fight to stay afloat in New York City, for a chance to hoist the coveted Golden Buoy. Watch the dramatic conclusion of the largest Buoy Championship to date.

programme.title: IWL Wrestball 3x3
programme.desc: The explosive fusion of basketball, rugby, and wrestling -- where agility, power, and strategy collide. Be the first to experience this new-rules-arena revolution.

programme.title: 2025 NESSBIC Finals
programme.desc: Top pinball players from across New England compete to take home the Speedy Silver Ball crown.

programme.title: The 2024 Onewheel World Championship - Race For The Rail
programme.desc: The World Championship Onewheel Racing event featured the best Onewheel riders zooming down Sky Tavern Ski Mountain in a boardercross style event for $10,000. This race took place outside of Reno, Nevada on August 9th, 2024.

programme.title: Roofball - 2025 RFA Cup
programme.desc: Players from around the country compete for Roofball's RFA Cup championship. Played in Lancaster,Ohio, at the first roof ever purpose-built for the game.

programme.title: 2023 National Putting Tour Final
programme.desc: The 2023 National Putting Tour Final from Putting World in Scottsdale, Arizona, as the nation's best putters battle it out to see who is the best.

programme.title: 11th Annual Outhouse Races
programme.desc: Teams build their own custom outhouses -- each equipped with a mandatory toilet seat for the driver and a roll within reach. One outhouse races another, with teams straining to push their rig across the finish line and be crowned Fastest Throne.

programme.title: Swiss Stone Tossing
programme.desc: Contestants grunt and hurl earth-shaped stones in their natural state -- no polish, no shine. The furthest legal toss without crossing the line takes the win. It's simple, primal, and strangely satisfying.

programme.title: Diving Chess: Duel in the Depths
programme.desc: Two champions face off in a high-stakes underwater chess match -- where every move is made on a single breath.

programme.title: Viii Sports 2024 National Championship
programme.desc: Ordinary people with a passion for sports compete in eight athletic events: golf, softball, tennis, basketball, football, soccer, strength, and speed. These everyday athletes push their limits and showcase their skills in a thrilling competition.

programme.title: 2024 AWA Wiffle Ball All Star Game
programme.desc: The 2024 AWA Wiffle Ball All Star Game from Rock Hill, South Carolina. The format has the NL All-Stars taking on the AL-All Stars.

programme.title: Path to the College Football Playoff
programme.desc: A look at how the two finalists made it to the College Football Playoff national championship game.

programme.title: World Axe & Knife Throwing Championship 2025

programme.title: Coffin Wars, Grapple to the Grave
programme.desc: PLN's popular combat sports series presents, Coffin Wars, full-contact grappling inside custom-built coffins,where athletes grapple inside casket-sized cages in a ridiculous-yet-real clash of strength, strategy, and pure un-deadlifted willpower.

programme.title: Tire Wrestling: No Ropes, Just Rubber
programme.desc: PLN's Ultimate Tire Wrestling turns grappling into a dunk contest -- using stacked tractor tires as the rim. Athletes wrestle for control, aiming to lift and slam opponents into the rubber heap in a wild test of balance, brute force, and chaos.

programme.title: 2025 Corgi Races at Emerald Downs
programme.desc: Get ready for the cutest and most unpredictable event of the year as over 100 Corgis race for the Championship trophy!

programme.title: 2023 Wisconsin Auctioneers Championships
programme.desc: Competitors chant, bark and call for a cash prize and trophy in the 2023 Wisconsin Auctioneers Competition. From Fond Du Lac, Wis.

programme.title: The Guild Garage
programme.desc: S06E07 History and Hairpin Turns David drives the inner-city course for the Circuit des Remparts, a route that includes three perilous hairpin turns; when the race begins, he and Janice are shocked at the speed and the valuable vintage race cars participating.

programme.title: The Guild Garage
programme.desc: S06E08 Bugatti Bucket List David visits France's Cité de l'Automobile, the largest car museum in the world; a former drag racer who broke his back in an accident brings his '68 Firebird in for upgrades that will allow him to drive it again.

programme.title: The Guild Garage
programme.desc: S06E09 Restore the Lore David and Janice explore the Cite de l'Automobile's restoration department, where they find one of the world's most expensive cars, plus a rare Panhard Dynamic that David thought no longer existed.

programme.title: The Guild Garage
programme.desc: S06E10 Win, Lose and Draw A 1977 Ford F-250 barn find proves to be in better condition than David could have ever imagined; Janice takes the Guild girls out on a test drive in her recently acquired and repaired 1961 Hillman Minx.

programme.title: The Guild Garage
programme.desc: S06E11 The Magnificent Seven David and Janice must pick seven unique cars for the Atlanta Concours d'Elegance's Magnificent Seven competition; Brad discovers that the engine in a 1935 Bugatti Aerolithe is in rough shape from extensive touring.

programme.title: The Guild Garage
programme.desc: S06E12 Cars With Soul Ron and Greg find some strange restoration work as they dig into a '70 Dodge Charger; Johnney finishes up a custom job on a '57 Cadillac Eldorado Brougham, once considered the world's most expensive car.

programme.title: The Guild Garage
programme.desc: S07E01 Miracle Mercury Coupe Larry visits and is excited by the advancement of his two projects, a 1948 Delahaye 135MS Cabriolet, and a custom Mercury being designed in California by renowned car builder Keith Dean.

programme.desc: S07E02 Couped Up A 1977 Ford F-250 pickup truck evolves from barn find to beauty, and the owners arrive for the unveiling; Brad has a challenging time figuring out the starter and starter clutch in the unusual engine of an obscure 1966 Honda S600.

programme.desc: S07E03 Fire Fighting Heritage The crew learns about the oil history of a town when the fire department brings a 1925 International fire truck in for restoration; Brad, a volunteer firefighter, is eager to take on the project even though he knows finding parts will be difficult.

programme.desc: S10E11 Duster in the Wind SEMA is over and the Ghouls can finally get back to work on all the cars they had to leave untouched for the last few weeks; first up, they work on a beautiful 1972 Duster.

programme.desc: S03E01 New Hell, Old Hell Jamie Davis Heavy Rescue splits in two with Adam taking half the fleet to Alberta's rich oil fields and Jamie staying back to keep the Coq open.

programme.title: Highway Thru Hell
programme.desc: S02E17 The Comeback Kid Reloaded Featuring bonus footage, extended scenes, tweets and factoids; Jamie brings back veteran driver Scott by promising him a new state-of-the-art heavy wrecker; the new truck is months behind schedule so Scott settles for a worn-out vintage truck.

programme.title: Highway Thru Hell
programme.desc: S03E01 New Hell, Old Hell Jamie Davis Heavy Rescue splits in two with Adam taking half the fleet to Alberta's rich oil fields and Jamie staying back to keep the Coq open.

programme.title: Highway Thru Hell
programme.desc: S03E02 New Hope Jamie hires a new driver who crashes Bruce's legendary blue truck; rookie operator Colin learns how tough his new boss Adam can be.

programme.title: Mighty Cruise Ships
programme.desc: S01E04 Celebrity Solstice Facing Australia's fierce heat, Celebrity Solstice provides guests with views of waterfalls, jumping crocodiles, koalas and the Great Barrier Reef.

programme.title: Mighty Cruise Ships
programme.desc: S01E05 Stella Australis The only cruise ship designed specifically to navigate the treasures and dangers at the southern tip of South America.

programme.title: Heavy Rescue: 401
programme.desc: S02E03 Guardian Angel A massive multiple-semi crash in a tunnel forces the Coxon crew to clear a big mess in a tight space; Mark Haslett heads to the rescue when a woman is trapped on a dangerous stretch of the highway in Toronto.

programme.title: Mighty Cruise Ships
programme.desc: S01E04 Celebrity Solstice Facing Australia's fierce heat, Celebrity Solstice provides guests with views of waterfalls, jumping crocodiles, koalas and the Great Barrier Reef.

programme.title: Graveyard Carz
programme.desc: S2 E7 Every Rose Has Its Thorn The ghouls get the '70 AAR Cuda 340 Six Barrel car completely disassembled and off to the media blaster. Mark disassembles and restores the right-hand door to the 71' 440 Phantom Cuda. In addition, the headliner and vinyl top is installed in the 71 'Phantasm' Tribute car.

programme.title: Graveyard Carz
programme.desc: S2 E8 You Win Some … The owner of the '70 AAR Cuda 340 Six Barrel car visits the shop and learns about assembly-line markings. Mark checks the paint on the body of the '70 Cuda 383 Automatic FE5 Rallye Red Car and discovers a major problem.

programme.title: Graveyard Carz
programme.desc: S2 E9 Cuda Madness The ghouls receives a '70 Barracuda Convertible to get a full restoration. Despite improbability, Mark straightens the fender for the '71 440 Phantom Cuda and the crew continues the restoration of the '71 'Phantasm' Tribute car.

programme.title: Graveyard Carz
programme.desc: S2 E9 Cuda Madness The ghouls receives a '70 Barracuda Convertible to get a full restoration. Despite improbability, Mark straightens the fender for the '71 440 Phantom Cuda and the crew continues the restoration of the '71 'Phantasm' Tribute car.

programme.title: Graveyard Carz
programme.desc: S2 E10 Flippin' the Bird The ghouls detail and assemble the suspension of the '70 AAR Cuda 340 Six Barrel car. The owners of the '70 Plymouth Superbird, in the queue for resurrection, visit the shop and Daren convinces the crew to throw a birthday party for Mark.

programme.title: Graveyard Carz
programme.desc: S2 E11 Fish n' Chips Mark takes some time for himself and leaves Daren in charge of the shop. The crew gets the newly painted panels installed on the '70 Cuda 383 Automatic FE5 Rallye Red Car. And Mark discovers a chip on the '71 'Phantasm' Tribute car and no one will own up to it.

programme.title: Graveyard Carz
programme.desc: S2 E12 Game Day The fuel and brake lines are installed in the '71 'Phantasm' Tribute car. Daren quits and won't return until Mark begins the restoration of his '70 Plum Crazy Challenger. A phone-call from the Phantasm car owner forces Mark to make a promise he might not be able to keep.

programme.title: Graveyard Carz
programme.desc: S2 E13 Phantasm ‘Cuda The GYC crew is under the gun to get the '71 Cuda 340 Triple Black 'Phantasm' Tribute car finished by the end of the week. With the exhaust, ornamation, and the engine start still ahead of them, will they be able to finish the car before the director of the 'Phantasm' movie franchise arrives?

programme.title: Graveyard Carz
programme.desc: S3 E1 Back in Triple Black Mark and the team rush to complete the triple-black, '71 Cuda, Phantasm homage car. The director and star of Phantasm, Don Coscarelli and A. Michael Baldwin, visit Graveyard Carz to check out the homage car and hopefully, drive it around town.

programme.title: Rutter's Detailin Garage
programme.desc: S2 E7 Detailing an Electric Vehicle Nick Rutter walks you through step-by-step on how to detail the exterior as well as the interior of an electric vehicle, including vegan leather cleaning and conditioning.

programme.title: Rutter's Detailin Garage
programme.desc: S2 E8 Detailing Tips & Techniques Nick Rutter walks you through the best tools, chemicals, and accessories for performing a myriad of detailing tasks, including cleaning buffing pads, selecting the best tire shine, as well as quick interior maintenance.

programme.title: Truck U
programme.desc: S7 E17 Jeep Build-Off Day 4 The Jeep Build-Off continues as the guys get a chance to finish their Jeeps and take them on a Geocaching race for all of the marbles.

programme.title: Truck U
programme.desc: S7 E18 Jeep Build-Off Day 5 The Jeep Build-Off continues as the guys get a chance to finish their Jeeps and take them on a Geocaching race for all of the marbles.

programme.title: Truck U
programme.desc: S8 E1 Commander vs Razor What UTV should you buy? Should it be a Can Am Commander or a Razor RZR? Matt and Bruno show you what kind of upgrades you can do to each of them, and then they have some fun on the trails!

programme.title: Truck U
programme.desc: S8 E2 Shop Misinformation Matt and Bruno show you what a car dealership is going to look for when your truck hits a 100-thousand miles to determine its trade in value. Matt and Bruno show you what kind of repairs you can do yourself to get the most value on your truck.

programme.title: Truck U
programme.desc: S8 E3 Diesel Track Truck The gloves are off….so is the exhaust, DPF, and anything else that makes our diesel track truck street legal. Today a King Ranch is getting ready for a date with the drag strip.

programme.title: Truck U
programme.desc: S8 E4 Wish List Project A final wish list from a customer gets completed on a 1985 C-10 project truck, and we cure a slipping transmission problem on a Dodge.

programme.title: Truck U
programme.desc: S8 E5 Wrecked When your work truck gets wrecked, your ability to work stops. Matt and Bruno take on a project to get a work truck back on the road with some body work and repair.

programme.title: Truck U
programme.desc: S8 E6 Jeep Beast Matt and Bruno ‘s Jeep project is going to be a beast when they get finished with it. The guys install a supercharger and a long arm suspension to give it some life, and they finish it up with a new exhaust and a mean front bumper that will provide the “bite.” Then, the beast is unleashed!

programme.title: Stacey David's Gearz
programme.desc: S10 E1 Nuts Bolts Building Sgt Rock Season 10 Starts off with America’s favorite military tribute truck! Sgt. Rock is back and ready for final assembly! Garage Guru, Stacey David, takes us on a tour de force of custom fabrication as he covers all the nuts and bolts of what it’s taken to get Sgt. Rock ready to rumble. Builders of all levels are in for a great show as Stacey tackles one of a kind steering columns, gas pedals and designing a console that not only fits form, but also function. Gauge techs will keep your instrument panels in line. And a quick tip will keep your wires from fraying and your hoses from splitting. All this and more as Sgt. Rock and Season 10 hit the road full throttle.

programme.title: Stacey David's Gearz
programme.desc: S10 E2 Sgt Rock Interior Other Details A custom build can lose some power if the theme doesn’t stay consistent. Stacey shows how to do that by taking you through the process of how to make door and kick panels that keep the rugged military WWII bomber vibe flowing throughout the interior of Sgt. Rock. After that, its some tips on how to fit a radiator and that all-important cooling fan in a place where space is limited. Finally, the gas tank and battery placement are critical on a custom vehicle and Stacey goes through the steps in doing that as well. If you’ve always wanted to build a custom vehicle, this episode is sure to get your fabrication gearZ turning.

programme.title: Stacey David's Gearz
programme.desc: S10 E3 Asessing Unfinished Project Two things are certain in life: death and taxes. We all know what to do with taxes, but what happens when a loved one passes and leaves behind an unfinished project vehicle? How do you know what’s sitting in your garage? And how can you find out? Stacey tackles these questions and takes you on a thorough inventory of an almost finished restoration that was left to a widow when her husband suddenly died. A new dash going into your vehicle? A gauge tech should keep you from crossing your wires. And we’ve got tips that should help with battery relocation and lining up your vehicle’s body panels.

programme.title: Stacey David's Gearz
programme.desc: S10 E4 Gearz On The Road - Basic Tools The GearZ crew mount up and head out to visit a young gear-head whose love of wrenching started with 4-wheelers and has grown to include 4-wheel drive pick ups. Young Adam has a few surprises in store as Stacey visits him in his Dad’s garage and discusses tools, storage and tearing apart things to see how they work. Then, it’s back in the shop as Stacey takes on the big question every gear-head has: What OTHER tools should I have in my box? A look beyond the typical wrenches, hammers and clamps will show you what you may need and what you may not, depending on your project.

programme.title: Stacey David's Gearz
programme.desc: S10 E5 Cheetah Body Work Latches Custom Exhaust The son of legendary car builder, Bill Thomas, talks shop about wrenching, racing and his father’s Cobra Killer…the Cheetah. Then Stacey heads over to Stainless Works to check out how the Cheetah’s custom side pipes, headers and mufflers came together. A Gauge Tech explains the pros and cons of mechanical vs. electric gauges. After that, a Quick Tip explains the proper way to use some of those mystery tools laying around in your tool box.

programme.title: Stacey David's Gearz
programme.desc: S10 E6 Old Dog New Truck Ever wonder why your wife or best buddy won’t step foot in your late model truck? It could be that crusty interior. Tag along as Stacey takes on the sights and smells of an ’83 Chevy in dire need of some attention. From new dash to leather on the bench seat and new carpet in the floor, Stacey shows you what a difference a weekend and some parts from LMC can make. Speaking of trucks, Stacey raises the bar with a bed lifter that will make you the most popular guy in your neighborhood. A new buffer is going to help add some shine to your vehicle and a creeper that’s simply “Magic” is sure to raise an eyebrow or two. Big things are happening in the garage this week on GearZ.

programme.title: Stacey David's Gearz
programme.desc: S10 E7 Reviving An Old Snowcat Through the years, we’ve had some amazing vehicles featured on GearZ—from elite racecars to the insanity of a V-8 barstool. Well, here we go again! Stacey hauls in a Thiokol Imp that needs some…attention. First things first with this crazy snowcatmobile; we’ve got to see if we can make it run. Follow along as Stacey takes you through the ins and outs of getting a neglected vehicle up and running again. For you performance BMW guys, a tuner from Dinan is going add the horses you’ve been looking for. We’ve got sparks flying, fuel splashing and all kinds of garage mayhem this week on GearZ.

programme.title: Stacey David's Gearz
programme.desc: S10 E8 Wiring Sgt Rock In the world of car building there are few things more ominous than missing titles or VIN numbers. But there is one task that stands out, one that brings grown men to tears, one that is usually lurking behind 100 yards of electrical tape…WIRING. Well hold on tight as Stacey dives head first into wiring Sergeant Rock. That’s right; see how painless Stacey can make wiring the big old truck. Follow along as Stacey moves front to back and gets the Rock one step closer to hitting the road!

programme.title: Stacey David's Gearz
programme.desc: S10 E9 New AC Old Chevy With summer in full swing, it’s time to cool down that classic truck of yours. That’s right, roll those windows up and feel the cool breeze as Stacey shows just how easy it is to install this complete AC system from LMC Truck. Now that you’re done sweatin’, let’s take a look at headers and intakes and get that motor performing the way it should. And don’t miss out on the ins and outs of turbos and super-chargers…which one fits your needs? All this and plenty of sparks in the garage this week on GearZ.

programme.title: Stacey David's Gearz
programme.desc: S10 E10 Building A Better Tool Stacey and the GearZ crew heat things up as they head to the Cornwell forges to watch molten steel be expertly transformed into America’s best ratchet. Get ready to see sparks fly. But the trip doesn’t stop there. Tag along as the crew follows what it takes for a ratchet to end up on a Cornwell truck. Back in the garage, Stacey talks maximizing boost and the role of intercoolers when it comes to super-chargers and turbos. The wheels keep turning and the rubber keeps burning, this week on GearZ.

programme.title: Stacey David's Gearz
programme.desc: S10 E11 On The Road - 67 Ford Cheetah lovers will be excited to see Stacey’s solution to keeping the headers both cool and looking red hot. Want to keep using your stock tank after converting to fuel injection? Get psyched, because Holley has a new fuel pump that’s going to make your life a whole lot easier. Think your car is buttoned up tight? Stacey and some friends from Redline Detection blow smoke at the old soap and water test and show you how to really test for leaks in your vehicle. It’s a world of problems out there, but Stacey’s got you covered in the garage. All this and more, this week, on GearZ.

programme.title: Stacey David's Gearz
programme.desc: S10 E12 Novas BBQ This week Stacey and crew head to Memphis, TN to help out a local BBQ pitmaster who’s deep into a ground up rebuild of a ’72 Nova. The big challenge here?...Can you swap out an automatic transmission with a manual without losing your mind? Well, Stacey is always up for a good challenge and he’ll show you just how simple this swap can be. A new tuner from Super chips will make your Jeep life easier, and replacement dashes for Chevy owners are going to light up their eyes. There’s a lot going on in the garage this week on GearZ.

programme.title: Stacey David's Gearz
programme.desc: S10 E13 Cheap Fuel Injection Snow Cat Bed TN Electric Guitar We’re winding up the tenth season of GearZ, and what a season it’s been! But we’ve got some business to take care of before we move onto season eleven. First things first…Holley just made an EFI even easier to install on your carbureted vehicle, and Stacey will show you just how on target the Sniper is. The Thiokol Imp gets a suspension upgrade to keep it on track. And there’s a new kind of off-roading that’s sweeping the nation…see what RC4WD has going on. And what season would be complete without guitars? Check out Tennessee Electric Company as Stacey introduces a new guitar-maker whose custom guitars are hotter than the asphalt at the drag strip.

programme.title: Stacey David's Gearz
programme.desc: S11 E1 The SL-C’s Hit the Road We’re back and taking it to the streets! Season 11 comes roaring back with a look at Super Lite Cars on the road and the track! Stacey recalls and earlier SLC build and introduces two SLC builders who took a very hands-on approach to putting their cars together. These street/race cars are sure to catch your eye and get your racing blood flowing. If there’s one thing Stacey preaches on every episode, it’s paying attention to the details. His quick tip is no exception, getting rid of those sharp edges and nasty welds to give your project the small details that people will notice. Side mirrors for a muscle car, building a better battery, and keeping your air flowing through carbon fiber vents fill out the parts bin. We’ve got all this and more as Stacey kicks of his 11th season of GearZ!

programme.title: Stacey David's Gearz
programme.desc: S11 E2 Sgt. Rock Lives! This is the moment you’ve been waiting for! Master car builder, Stacey David, shows off the truck that’s had the nation talking for ten years! Take a look back at the kid with the dream. Follow the design and fabrication. See what happens when the military tribute vehicle rolls out and conquers the road! This episode is gonna be epic. It’s been a long road, but anything worth doing well is worth the wait. This week, the wait is over. Sergeant Rock Lives!

programme.title: Stacey David's Gearz
programme.desc: S11 E3 On the Road & Unicure Spray Booths Things are rockin’ and rollin’ in and out of the GearZ garage. Stacey hits the road to find a project build that will get gear heads buzzing. He ends up with an ’81 Camaro and some awesome stories from the seller. If you’re talking project vehicles, you’ve got to talk paint! And Stacey does just that with folks from Unicure, who specialize in paint booths and helping you get set up for that all important paint job. The V-8 Interceptor is back from a trip to Stainless works, where a custom exhaust system was made for the big Boss Nine engine. Things are about to get loud, this week on GearZ.

programme.title: Stacey David's Gearz
programme.desc: S11 E4 The Return of Heavy Metal & Snowcat Stacey and the GearZ crew roll in an old favorite: Heavy Metal. The coolest hotrod tow truck is back in the garage and ready for a facelift. Our good friends at the Hot Rod Institute drop by and talk shop with Stacey about his plans for the paint and fab work needed to get this bad boy looking good and back on the road. Fresh from the sandblaster, the snowcat reveals the scars that were under the skin. And with the drive train out, Stacey walks through the importance of replacing gaskets, seals and checking for wear and tear before stuffing that engine, transmission and skid steer rear end back into the cat. There’s a whole lot going on this week on GearZ.

programme.title: Stacey David's Gearz
programme.desc: S11 E5 Stunt Double Every gear head has a secret: they all want to drive like McQueen in Bullitt, or Vin Diesel in The Fast And The Furious. But when the heat gets turned up, even some really good drivers can’t keep up. That’s when you bring in the Stunt Double! This week Stacey sits down with legendary Hollywood stunt man Ian Quinn to talk crashing cars and keeping actors out of harms way. There’s also a new project in the garage: The Stunt Double, a build inspired by the 80’s tv show The Fall Guy, and sure to get all four wheels off the ground before Stacey’s done with it. Sparks are going to fly and you know we’re gonna have a good time this week on GearZ.

programme.title: Stacey David's Gearz
programme.desc: S11 E6 Catalog Camaro Nose Job Seems like you can’t go more than a block these days without running into someone whose had some work done on their face. Well, here at the GearZ garage, Stacey believes in facelifts too. Just to prove it, he’s taken on a 1981 Camaro and sharpened his scalpel to perform an automotive nose job. Just wait till you see him whack of the old rubber nose and replace it with a 71’ rally sport front end! Now that’s what we call a facelift. Plenty of people said it couldn’t be done, but that’s just the kind of challenge Stacey is up for. Plenty of sparks are gonna fly, this week on GearZ.

programme.title: Stacey David's Gearz
programme.desc: S11 E6 Catalog Camaro Nose Job Seems like you can’t go more than a block these days without running into someone whose had some work done on their face. Well, here at the GearZ garage, Stacey believes in facelifts too. Just to prove it, he’s taken on a 1981 Camaro and sharpened his scalpel to perform an automotive nose job. Just wait till you see him whack of the old rubber nose and replace it with a 71’ rally sport front end! Now that’s what we call a facelift. Plenty of people said it couldn’t be done, but that’s just the kind of challenge Stacey is up for. Plenty of sparks are gonna fly, this week on GearZ.

programme.title: Stacey David's Gearz
programme.desc: S11 E8 Stunt Double Gets a Lift When you’re putting together a project that’s inspired by a high-flying stunt truck, you know you’ve got to add some lift, and our Stunt Double gets the goods this week. The front and rear suspension get treated to a 6” lift to get that rig up in the air. But a good lift won’t do any good if the steering and frame can’t hold up, so Stacey shows you how Offroad Design has fixed some serious issues that many late model four-wheel drives encounter. Bed need to come off your truck, but the carriage bolts are rusted and spinning? Stacey’s got a fix for that too. There’s a lot going on, and we’ve got you covered, this week on GearZ.

programme.title: Stacey David's Gearz
programme.desc: S11 E9 Ram Gets a Procharger Everyone needs a little boost here and there. For some people, coffee does the trick. But here in the GearZ Garage we take our boost seriously. And we like ours packing 160 HP. Hang on to your seat as Stacey adds a bolt on Supercharger to a Ram 1500 breathes a little excitement into a daily driver. And speaking of things going on in the garage, you’ll definitely want to stick around as Stacey talks shop with the guys at Rebuilding Generations. Learn all about how this mentoring program is teaching the next generation about working on cars and sharing plenty of life lessons. We’ve got a lot going on this week on GearZ.

programme.title: Stacey David's Gearz
programme.desc: S11 E10 Stunt Double Drivetrain We’re running full steam ahead as the Stunt Double rolls back into the shop this week! First, Stacey reveals the wheels and tires that are going to accentuate that 6” lift, then He dives headlong into the drivetrain of this beast and comes up with a hot crate engine and a high-performance transmission to get the Stunt Double ready for the road. But that’s not all…. We also take some time out for a visit with the guys from American Powertrain and so much more. Check out the sparks flying in the garage this week on GearZ.

programme.title: Stacey David's Gearz
programme.desc: S11 E11 Catalog Camaro Front Suspension It’s business as usual in the garage this week. We’re back at work on the Catalog Camaro and really diggin’ into the front end. You know what they say, “out with the old and in with the new,” and that’s exactly what Stacey’s doing. The old sub frame, drivetrain, and suspension are hitting the garage floor in favor of a much-needed updated suspension system that’ll keep this awesome Camaro hugging the road at high speeds—From the wheels to the sub frame, Stacey’s replacing it all. And he’s not going to break the bank while doing it, either. Follow the GearZ crew as they hit the road and visit Cornwell Tools to see their latest and greatest tool box being manufactured. From powder coat to knuckle bustin’ bolts, we’ve got you covered this week on GearZ.

programme.title: Stacey David's Gearz
programme.desc: S11 E12 Procharger Visit We head out of the garage to visit one of the premiere supercharger manufacturers in the world… ATI Pro Charger. Follow along for the ride as Stacey walks through the entire process of how they have raised the bar on how a supercharger is built and what it does. From bulk metal to dyno runs, we’ve got it covered. Back in the garage, a young Gearhead drops by to learn how to install an air intake and cowl induction hood on his pick-up. After the wrench turning is done, he and Stacey have enough time to hit a few licks on their guitars. From massive horsepower increases with state-of-the-art tools and machinery, to simple intake and hood installs,….. it’s all here, this week on GearZ.

programme.title: Stacey David's Gearz
programme.desc: S11 E13 Recaps & Catchups Stacey is in full hot rod mode as he unveils a wicked LS engine and Tremec 6spd tranny and stuffs it into the Catalog Camaro. If 600hp and a 6spd in a Camaro doesn’t get you going, the update on the Stunt Double will! It’s old school cool as Stacey shows off the stainless light bar, side steps and cutout flairs to give the truck that “Fall Guy” vibe. After that we introduce you to the amazing world of scale R/C that is sure to have you re-thinking what you want for Christmas! Finally we roll in some updates on the Cheetah and the Junkyard Jag too. If you’re a gearhead, you’re gonna find a whole lot to love about this show!......and that’s GEARZ!!!

programme.title: Stacey David's Gearz
programme.desc: S12 E1 Puttin’ on the B.R.A.K.E.S Season 12 opens with bang as Stacey starts the final assembly process on the V8 Interceptor. If you’ve ever wondered how to lay out an aftermarket A/C system, wiring harness, and steering column on your project… and make them all work together, you have to see this show! After that, NHRA legend and Hall-of-Famer, Doug Herbert drops by the GearZ garage to share the shocking story that inspired him to start the B.R.A.K.E.S. driving program. Hold on tight, because this ain't your typical high school driver's Ed. Program! If you want cool tech and awesome stories… you’re gonna find that on GEARZ!

programme.title: Stacey David's Gearz
programme.desc: S12 E2 Snowcat Bed Fabrication It’s all about fabrication and thinking outside the box, or to be more specific... outside the bed! Sure, sure, there are plenty of custom pick-up truck beds you can buy but Stacey shows you what is involved in MAKING a custom bed to fit any vehicle, even something as crazy as a Thiokol Imp snowcat! That's right… our little snowcat is back from the sand blaster and ready for a cool bed to match the cab. Stacey goes in-depth about sizing up the project, picking the right parts, and most importantly: how to cut, weld, grind and finish sheet metal to get a bed that will fit your unique vehicle like a glove. So grab a welder… it’s time to make your bed!... only on GearZ.

programme.title: Stacey David's Gearz
programme.desc: S12 E3 Fort Carson On The Road Stacey takes a trip to Fort Carson, Colorado to visit the Army auto skills program during their world conference. Not only does Stacey get to meet a General, but he also meets a young Sergeant who is in the middle of a frame-off square body restoration. After a thorough walk around, Stacey decides to get LMC involved in helping out with this build. Parts for the bed of his truck can’t match the gratitude we share for our active military and all those who have served, but it’s a start. And we can’t wait to see the project when it’s finished. And speaking of new beds, with the custom bed on the Snow Cat, it’s time to address the tracks, and Right Track Systems has us covered. That little cat is going to tear it up when all is said and done! It’s going to be a lot of fun, this week on GearZ.

programme.title: Stacey David's Gearz
programme.desc: S12 E4 V8 Interceptor Final Assembly It’s all about Cougars! No, not that kind of Cougar... the kind with 4 wheels and a legendary pedigree! After a short history lesson about how these cars came into existence and why they were so cool, Stacey rolls the V8 Interceptor back into the shop and digs into the final assembly of this wild ’67 Mercury Cougar. This week’s episode focuses on planning out your final assembly, and taking care of all the little details, before you put the big things in like engine and transmission. Whether it’s planning out your brake system, battery location, or running fuel lines, Stacey shows how a little extra time in the planning department will make all the difference in your build.

programme.title: Stacey David's Gearz
programme.desc: S12 E5 SR-71 Blackbird & Panel Truck Stacey takes us through the history of the legendary SR-71 Blackbird. If you’re not familiar with this bird, it could fly mach 3.2, cruise at 80,000 feet and kept our country safe through its many reconnaissance missions. Never shot down, and never outrun, it was the hot rod of the sky! Stacey gets to sit down with pilot Lt. Col. Ed Yeilding and talk about his record setting transcontinental flight—Coast to Coast in 67 minutes and 54 seconds! The iconic Blackbird was such an inspiration that you know Stacey had to make a vehicle inspired by and paying tribute to it, so get ready to meet the SR-71 Rapid Tool Express!!!

programme.title: Stacey David's Gearz
programme.desc: S12 E6 Catalog Camaro Butt Lift and Tummy Tuck The Catalog Camaro is back in the garage and ready to go under the knife as Stacey shows how to do a butt lift and tummy tuck on a 2nd generation Camaro. What does that mean? Well, last season Stacey performed a nose job on this old ’81 Camaro to show how easy it is to get rid of the 80’s plastic front bumpers and put on the classic early 70’s split-bumper, rally sport front sheetmetal. This week he continues the makeover by losing the plastic rear bumper and wrap-around taillights and grafting in the early 70’s quarter panels, round taillights and chrome bumper. It’s more in depth than the front and definitely requires some skilled metal surgery, but Stacey shows you all the tricks on how to do it properly. So, sit back and enjoy the ride as Stacey details how to measure, cut, and weld your way to a much younger looking Camaro.

programme.title: Stacey David's Gearz
programme.desc: S12 E7 Big Bad Buick Stacey rolls in a Big Bad Buick Riviera and shows you what is possible with the right vehicle and some bolt on parts. This 1972 Riviera is a great entry-level project that won’t break the bank, and has the potential to serve some serious humble-pie to any unsuspecting hot shot that may want to mix it up at the stoplight. As it sits, the big 455 under the hood is a force to be reckoned with, but Stacey shows what a weekend in the garage and a top end rebuild can do for a car like this! Get ready to get your hands dirty and bust a few knuckles as Stacey pulls the old heads, intake, cam, and ignition off and replaces them with performance parts from companies like TA Performance, Edelbrock, and MSD. It’s a lesson in Buick and bolt-on horsepower, and you’re only gonna find it on GearZ.

programme.title: Stacey David's Gearz
programme.desc: S12 E8 Cheetah Paint & Body The GearZ crew hits the road this week and travels to the Charlotte Speed Shop to see how paint prep is going on Stacey’s Cheetah Evolution Car. With the hood and side vents glassed in and smoothed out, the first coat of primer gets sprayed and this awesome cat takes one big step closer to coming home! Stacey also stops by to visit with a fellow boat tail Riviera owner and trade tips on beefing up these classic beauties. It turns out that this guy and Stacey had both been watching this same car when it came up for sale! Come hang out with us as we visit some great folks this week on GearZ.

programme.title: Stacey David's Gearz
programme.desc: S12 E9 Big Bad Buick Inside & Out Stacey gets down to business on the Big Bad Buick. With the top end engine rebuilt, the exterior and interior of the car need some serious updating. You don’t have to spend a ton of cash on simple modifications. Stacey shows what’s behind making a good clean line with your bumpers and how a simple front and rear bumper tuck can drastically change the appearance. Replacing the grille and scraping off that old vinyl top are also sure-fire ways to add attitude to this big ol’ boat tail. That old carpet has got to go! Follow along as Stacey shows the ins and outs and some tips and tricks to keep your exterior and interior redo from breaking the bank.

programme.title: Stacey David's Gearz
programme.desc: S12 E10 Old #7 Camaro Part 1 Not everyone out there is wrenching on an a classic. In fact, we get tons of emails from viewers who want to upgrade brand-new vehicles but aren’t sure how to get started. Well, Stacey has the answer—and it comes with a little help from our friend and NASCAR legend Jimmie Johnson and a stunning 2018 Camaro SS. Come hang out in the garage as Stacey walks you through the top seven modifications that you can make to a car that you just drove off the lot! Everything from paint upgrades to wheels, Stacey’s got a list. Let’s get started!

programme.title: Stacey David's Gearz
programme.desc: S12 E11 Old #7 Camaro Part 2 Stacey’s hard at work on a 2018 Camaro SS. This build is super-cool, not only because he’s running down a list of the top seven mods you can make on a brand-new car, but also because seven-time NASCAR champion, Jimmie Johnson is involved with the project. We’ve covered paint mods, body mods, and interior mods. Now it’s time to go under the hood and under the car and talk powers gains and handling upgrades!

programme.title: Stacey David's Gearz
programme.desc: S12 E12 Rapid Tool Express With our chassis and drivetrain out of the way, it’s time to get moving on the inside of the SR-71 Rapid Tool Express. But how do you organize a bunch of tools in and empty truck? Well, the guys from Summit Bodyworks do it every day on full size Cornwell tool trucks, so it’s only natural that they lend a hand in helping layout the inside our ’59 Panel to make it cool and serviceable. After that, Stacey addresses the issue of wooden floors and beds, and shows you an aluminum floor option that you’d swear came from the forest. Finally, the crew hits the road and gets a chance to talk with top fuel drag racer Leah Pritchett about her drive to become one of the best top fuelers in the nation. From design to drag racing, we’ve got it covered, this week on GearZ.

programme.title: Stacey David's Gearz
programme.desc: S12 E13 SR-71 Chassis & Drivetrain The SR-71 Rapid Tool Express is really taking off! We get our custom chassis from the Roadster Shop—those guys know a thing or two about quality builds. Engine Master Jon Kaase delivers a one-of-a-kind engine to power our SR-71. This build is coming together fast! With the body back on, Stacey takes you through some of the other mods that are going to tie this build in with the SR-71 Blackbird. Get ready, ya’ll, we’ve got loads of good stuff on GearZ.

programme.title: Stacey David's Gearz
programme.desc: S13 E1 SR-71 On The Move Season 13 is off and rumbling with Stacey showing off the new exhaust system for the SR-71 Rapid Tool Express project. From the headers to the tailpipes, this exhaust is going to scream! After that, it’s chassis details as Stacey lays out a plan for pedals, brakes and a fuel tank. Of course You can’t have an SR-71 inspired build without some killer wheels and wait ‘til you see what Stacey and our good friends at Neely Precision come up with. It’s all good, and it’s all here, this week on GearZ.

programme.title: Stacey David's Gearz
programme.desc: S13 E2 Heavy Metal Paint & Body The biggest Toy in the shop is back... HEAVY METAL! Yes... Our old junk yard International Tow Truck rolls back into the garage as the freshly painted cab returns from the Hot Rot Institute. And it’s not just any paint, It’s Razzleberry from Axalta that’s so candy, you’ll want to take a bite! But there’s no time for that because Stacey jumps right in to putting a face and interior back in this old junkyard dog. The result will make you really glad that he rescued this one from the crusher! It’s recycling at it’s best... it’s GEARZ!

programme.title: Stacey David's Gearz
programme.desc: S13 E3 Heavy Metal Dash & Interior We’re moving full steam ahead with the Interior of the Heavy Metal cab coming together and now’s the time to get the dash set up. We’ve got new gauges, old gauges and a bunch of empty holes where switches and knobs lived in this truck’s former life. Stacey lays out the dos and donts of getting your dash updated and a layout that makes sense before it gets installed. GearZ hits the road with a special delivery for the Hot Rod Institute for all they’ve done for us and the restoration industry. Feeling a little down about your project? Well, Stacey has a tool tech that’s sure to lift you up! All this and more on GearZ!

programme.title: Stacey David's Gearz
programme.desc: S13 E4 SR-71 Interior The SR-71 Rapid Tool Express returns as Stacey digs into his old ’59 ford panel truck and shows how to convert it into a one-off tool delivery truck to show off a variety of Cornwell tools. From special shelves, lighting and floor, there are even a few surprises that are tucked away inside this rolling tool cart! Moving to the cab of the vehicle, Stacey addresses some of the issues people have when setting up seats and steering, and shows some simple tricks that make a huge difference in getting your seats and steering dialed in. Then it’s on the rear to lay out the gas tank, and then finally the SR-71 gets a new beak.... from a ’59 T-bird! ...What?!?.... how is that possible? Well, ya gotta watch GEARZ to find out!

programme.title: Stacey David's Gearz
programme.desc: S13 E5 Topping the Jeep The Jeep may be the single most modified vehicle out there. From winches to lights, doors and fenders, if you’ve got a Jeep, it probably has some accessories on it. But despite all that, one of the best things about a Jeep is the removable top. It also sparks one of the biggest debates... What is best: a soft top or a hard top? Stacey takes on the challenge by comparing a factory hard top with the new Bestop Trektop. The test will include everything from ease of install to styling, overall sound decibels and of course, how watertight it is. Hopefully you won’t get wet on this ride! Then it’s back to the shop where Stacey shows you that rotisseries aren’t just for chickens, and how an automotive rotisserie can make life in the shop a lot easier. Finally, it’s on to the right and wrong way to use weatherstrip adhesive to hold your rubbers on. Sound risqué? It’s not... it’s just GEARZ!

programme.title: Stacey David's Gearz
programme.desc: S13 E6 Stunt Double Paint It’s all about square body GM trucks, because The Stunt Double is back in the shop. First, we take a look back at the this awesome ‘86 Chevy 4x4 Silverado long bed build that pays tribute to the legendary Fall Guy TV truck. From its beginnings as a well-worn farm truck, you’ll see it get an upgraded suspension, interior, drivetrain, as we make it better than I was before... better... stronger... faster... wait, that was a DIFFERENT Lee Majors TV show! After that, we walk you through the paint job and show how it is similar to the Fall Guy truck, only different.... because It’s the Stunt Double!!! No hocus pocus... no movie magic... just a tough truck being built to handle the toughest stunts... only on GEARZ!

programme.title: Stacey David's Gearz
programme.desc: S13 E7 SR-71 Frame & Body Assembly The SR-71 Rapid Tool Express is back on the block and going back together for the last time. Stacey finishes up the frame into a rolling masterpiece with the suspension and drivetrain assembled for the last time. Then the body goes back on, and the interior starts to go together. We’re talking fitting the carpet, steering column and the new dash bezel and stuffing that bezel with custom SR-71 gauges. After that, Stacey shows some tricks on how to choose the right transmission and why rechargeable power tools are giving the tried and true air tools a run for their money! It's all here and more on GearZ!

programme.title: Stacey David's Gearz
programme.desc: S13 E8 Gas, Tops, Brushes & Samurais With the e85 market and flex fuel vehicles growing every day, Stacey dives into the myths and truths that surround ethanol and whether or not it’s a good choice for your vehicle. With a little help from Advanced Fuel Dynamics, Stacey installs a new fuel delivery system on a 2017 Mustang to show just how easy it is to up your performance and keep your engine safe at the same time. After that, Stacey and the crew head out west to tell the story of Bestop and how they’ve been making removable Jeep tops for decades. From rock-crawlers to the mall crawlers, Bestops unique past allows us to see what the future of the Jeep world will be. Finally, if you’re trying to decide between a stick or automatic transmission… hang out for a while as Stacey talks about converting your boring automatic to a lively manual transmission. We’ve got all this and more on GearZ!

programme.title: Stacey David's Gearz
programme.desc: S13 E9 Cornwell 100 It’s rare for people to reach the age of 100. It’s ever rarer for a business, but that just what Cornwell Quality Tools has done! Take a trip through the last century as Stacey tracks the development of a tool company started by a blacksmith, to the tool truck empire that stresses quality over everything else. Speaking of 100 years…trucks have been around for over a century, and for over a century, truck owners have struggled to find the best way to lift their trucks. Stacey sheds some light on picking the right kind of lift for the truck you’re driving. We’ve got all of this and more on GearZ.

programme.title: Stacey David's Gearz
programme.desc: S13 E10 The Return of Copperhead There’s nothing like a good mystery. One of our favorite GearZ mysteries is the whereabouts of Copperhead, the legendary C10 that Stacey built more than a decade ago. It seemed like the truck just disappeared. Well, it’s back!
